p: The total flavonoid quantification was measured using the AlCl 3 method by Berk at al. (2011) [ 16]. Test solutions (1 mL) were mixed with aluminum trichloride (2% in methanol). Similarly, a blank was prepared (sample solution (1 mL) and methanol (1 mL)). The absorbances were recorded at 415 nm after a 10-min incubation at room temperature. Results are expressed as milligrams of rutin equivalent per gram of sample (RE/g sample) [ 17].
